includedAssets.title: Raiders Of The Lost Ark
includedAssets.synopsis: Harrison Ford whips it to the Nazis in a race to locate the Ark of the Covenant. Indiana Jones makes his debut in Spielberg's rollicking ride.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Harrison Ford whips it to the Nazis in a race to locate the Ark of the Covenant. Indiana Jones makes his debut in Spielberg's rollicking ride.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Harrison Ford whips it to the Nazis in a race to locate the Ark of the Covenant. Indiana Jones makes his debut in Spielberg's rollicking ride.

includedAssets.title: Indiana Jones And The Temple Of Doom
includedAssets.synopsis: Adventurer Harrison Ford has to whip an evil cult to save an Indian village and its children. Steven Spielberg's rollercoaster prequel.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Adventurer Harrison Ford has to whip an evil cult to save an Indian village and its children. Steven Spielberg's rollercoaster prequel.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Adventurer Harrison Ford has to whip an evil cult to save an Indian village and its children. Steven Spielberg's rollercoaster prequel.

includedAssets.title: Indiana Jones And The Last Crusade
includedAssets.synopsis: The Nazis are closing in on the Holy Grail. But Indy's got a secret weapon - his dad! Sean Connery joins Harrison Ford for another adventure.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The Nazis are closing in on the Holy Grail. But Indy's got a secret weapon - his dad! Sean Connery joins Harrison Ford for another adventure.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The Nazis are closing in on the Holy Grail. But Indy's got a secret weapon - his dad! Sean Connery joins Harrison Ford for another adventure.

includedAssets.title: Indiana Jones And The Kingdom Of Crystal Skull
includedAssets.synopsis: Harrison Ford races Russian villain Cate Blanchett to find the legendary lost city of El Dorado. Adventure.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Harrison Ford races Russian villain Cate Blanchett to find the legendary lost city of El Dorado.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Harrison Ford races Russian villain Cate Blanchett to find the legendary lost city of El Dorado. Adventure.

includedAssets.title: Indiana Jones Movie Box Set
includedAssets.synopsis: Harrison Ford’s wisecracking archaeology professor embarks on a series of danger-filled adventures in search of rare and mystical historical artefacts. Action-adventure from director Steven Spielberg.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Harrison Ford’s wisecracking professor embarks on a series of adventures in search of mystical historical artefacts. From director Steven Spielberg.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Harrison Ford’s wisecracking archaeology professor embarks on a series of danger-filled adventures in search of rare and mystical historical artefacts. Action-adventure from director Steven Spielberg.

includedIn.title: Indiana Jones
includedIn.synopsis: A wisecracking archaeology professor embarks on a series of danger-filled adventures in search of rare and mystical historical artefacts, clashing with Nazi soldiers, ancient cults and old adversaries along the way.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: A wisecracking archaeology professor embarks on a series of danger-filled adventures in search of rare and mystical historical artefacts.
